name: EVOLT RUNNER
description:
Hello, 

Here's a little game I've been working on during my free time ,I learned a ton by doing it...

lots of work yet to do , some level design and the visual is a bit rough.

For now only the jump command is available (space or mouse click)  .I try to keep it playable with a Smartphone or tablet. 

I'll add an attack and dash soon tho.

Hope you enjoy even if it's very short for now!
